title: Android 11 - Can't access multi task from home screen
content:
Just updated to the new Android 11. Seems like they have removed the ability to go to multi tasking (switch apps) from the home screen. Can anyone confirm this?

I used to be able to swipe up from the home button and see what apps were open but now I need to open up an app then swipe up.

I am using KLWP and Nova Launcher but I don't know if that would affect this.
category: Homescreen and Launcher, Google Pixel 3 XL
